title: Fitletic Hydra 16 Running Belt
description: The best running belt I've found. Doesn't bounce, holds two 8 oz bottles of water, a large phone, ID cards, and I also carry pepper spray and swimming goggles with it.

title: REI Co-op On The Trail Cap
description: My running hat. Comfy, lightweight, keeps the UV rays off of my noggin, and has taken a ton of abuse and still looks new after a gentle handwash.

title: REI Co-op Swiftland 7" Running Shorts - Men's
description: My favorite running shorts. Lightweight and doubles as swim trunks for a post-run dip.

title: Shokz OPENRUN PRO 2 Headphones
description: Bone conduction sports headphones— very comfortable, long battery life, and decent audio.

title: COROS PACE Pro GPS Sport Watch
description: Lightweight GPS watch with great battery life and a vibrant AMOLED display.

title: Ridge 8mm Silicone Ring Set
description: Metal rings and their proclivity to deglove fingers always scared the hell out of me. These are soft but durable and won't rip your flesh off if you get them caught on something.

title: Beurer BR 60 Insect bite healer
description: A device that uses heat to alleviate itching and swelling from insect bites. It hurts like hell, but it works.

title: Amp
description: Amp is a frontier coding agent for your terminal and editor. Currently my favorite AI pair programmer.

title: Sublime Text
description: My go-to editor for manipulating text and mapping out ideas in code.

title: Ghostty
description: Ghostty is a fast, feature-rich, and cross-platform terminal emulator that uses platform-native UI and GPU acceleration.

title: Ecosia Browser
description: “The greenest browser on Earth”, they say. Chrome, under the hood, but with an eco-friendly mission.

title: Wahl Vapor Clippers
description: These clippers are fairly quiet and pretty strong. Does a good job on shaving my head as well as trimming my beard.

title: Merino Wool Ridge Cuff Beanie
description: Double layered, comfortable, lightweight, and warm.

title: Smartwool Thermal Merino Gloves
description: I use these when it drops below freezing. I can still use an iPhone when wearing them, and keeps my fingers warm but not too hot where they start to sweat.

title: Merino Wool Ankle Running Socks
description: These are great for any weather. Keeps my feet comfortable if it's hot or cold.

title: Under Armour Men's ColdGear® Fitted Crew
description: Great for when it starts to get really cold outside.

title: Under Armour Men's ColdGear® Leggings
description: Besides adding some warmth for your legs, these have a nice side pocket that securely holds a phone.

title: Defroster Pocket Tightz
description: These are when it gets really, really cold. They also have pockets on the side and in the back.

title: New Balance Impact Run Luminous Heat Jacket
description: This jacket is extremely thin and lightweight but exceptionally warm. I wear this for my coldest runs.
